title: Most people didn't complain about Alistar till now...
body:
But Mata does god-like on him and some people lose their minds and start calling him the most OP thing ever/needing to be disabled.

http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/782/935/ce2.png

replies.body: Pretty rare seeing cow played and positioned like a flanking assassin >:)

> [{quoted}](name=groovylord,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yMJu3m48,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-09-30T17:46:54.217+0000)
>
> Pretty rare seeing cow played and positioned like a flanking assassin >:)

Mata's just a bully on Alistar, with all the beefy plays...
I see what you did there

> [{quoted}](name=Shahamut,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yMJu3m48,comment-id=000800010000,timestamp=2016-09-30T19:29:43.730+0000)
>
> I see what you did there

Did you meat me in the middle?
No, but I'll start MOOving that way if you want ;)
Let's steer this conversation in a less ridiculous direction.

> [{quoted}](name=Zok72,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yMJu3m48,comment-id=000800010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-30T20:09:08.842+0000)
>
> Let's steer this conversation in a less ridiculous direction.

Are you saying it was a mis-steak to start this?
No, but it was a mistake to keep milking it.

> [{quoted}](name=RikoZerame,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yMJu3m48,comment-id=00080001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-30T20:37:00.725+0000)
>
> No, but it was a mistake to keep milking it.

Are we pasture breaking point?
Come on guys, you know 'you can't milk those'.

> [{quoted}](name=Shahamut,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yMJu3m48,comment-id=0008000100000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-30T20:52:28.446+0000)
>
> Come on guys, you know 'you can't milk those'.

It behooves you to be original.  Don't shank the thread by repeating puns.
You guys are udder-ly horrific at the pun game.

> [{quoted}](name=HeroineSam,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yMJu3m48,comment-id=000800010000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-01T01:44:23.290+0000)
>
> You guys are udder-ly horrific at the pun game.

I've herd that before.

> [{quoted}](name=chipndip1,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yMJu3m48,comment-id=00080001000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001,timestamp=2016-10-01T08:35:35.078+0000)
>
> How many puns you guys gonna shoe*horn* into this conversation?

Until the cows come home... or until Phreak comes in and roasts us.
fuck
Calf you?
How many puns you guys gonna shoe*horn* into this conversation?
Did I miss something?

> [{quoted}](name=groovylord,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yMJu3m48,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-09-30T17:46:54.217+0000)
>
> Pretty rare seeing cow played and positioned like a flanking assassin >:)

Full AP Thunderlords Alistar mid.  It's a lot of fun, just FYI.
*ahem* AP MOO MAN MID, AP MOO MAN MID, AP MOO MAN MID!! YOU CAN'T MILK MY SPIRIIIIIIITTTT!!!!!!!!!

> [{quoted}](name=TsunamiWave22,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yMJu3m48,comment-id=000800020000,timestamp=2016-09-30T18:55:03.229+0000)
>
> *ahem* AP MOO MAN MID, AP MOO MAN MID, AP MOO MAN MID!! YOU CAN'T MILK MY SPIRIIIIIIITTTT!!!!!!!!!

I'll have some of whatever you're having.
No can do coach, that'd be a bit awkward.
tfw I'm honored with a red's presence
oh cmon at least get a shiv instead of the hurricane!
You doubt hurricane on alistar? he isn't melee you know? (kappa)
I mean... don't you want to be a lightning cow?
Mmmm Alistar wearing a pikachu costume? Lets do it.
Am I witnessing Metamancy in the works?
IDEAS

I wouldn't say disabled. But against RNG he needs to go. That man is uncanny on him to a degree I've not seen in awhile. Not only that the cow brings tankiness and disruption. Damage isn't that great but don't really need it when a Sivir can run free in the back. I would say either ban the cow or play a poppy in some lane against RNG.

> That man is uncanny on him to a degree I've not seen in awhile.

Implying Alistair is difficult to play.

> [{quoted}](name=MrWasjig,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yMJu3m48,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-09-30T12:03:45.384+0000)
>
> Implying Alistair is difficult to play.

He's not difficult to play, he's difficult to master.

> [{quoted}](name=Oleandervine,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yMJu3m48,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-30T12:08:06.940+0000)
>
> He's not difficult to play, he's difficult to master.

I got used to his combo the first time I ever played. Mechanically not difficult. Incredibly straightforward ult and ability combo that has a point and click dash just for extra easiness.

> [{quoted}](name=Tychusfindlay919,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=yMJu3m48,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-30T12:14:44.141+0000)
>
> I got used to his combo the first time I ever played. Mechanically not difficult. Incredibly straightforward ult and ability combo that has a point and click dash just for extra easiness.

That doesn't mean you know when to engage, or when to knock someone around, or when to go balls deep and just tank hits while your team gets the kills. There's a lot more to playing a champion than mechanical know how.
Say actually when you said someone was uncanny on Alistair, you meant, they were just really good as a player x3

Consider this: no two champions are the same; every champion has different abilities and limits that can be pushed. Good players know what these are and can take full advantage of it. Mata is one such player who knows Alistar that well, and it's something he's renown for.  No, Alistar is not hard to figure out, but to pull off the stuff he did in that game shows that he's a phenomenal Alistar player and a phenomenal player in general. 

Mata is the sole reason TSM lost that game imo.
Fuck knows why I was downvoted, I just said he was a good player. Fuck the Boards lol x3

Alistar was always broken, it's just old news. His real weakness is that he's so relaint on his basic combo that has a long cooldown and high mana cost that he just can't peel if he uses it to engage or vice versa.
Who the hell buys protobelt on supports?
You would be surprise how protobelt is useful on Blitz, especially with {{item:3092}}

Are you serious? 

Have you watched any LCS ...? literally any of them? Alistar is an extremely common pick/playmaker.

Welcome to League of Legends.

https://cdn.meme.am/instances/58752711.jpg

oh?

can you show me a few threads of said people complaining about alistar?
Is anyone actually saying that?  I haven't seen it.
ummm alistar has always been strong, i don't know who the hell this mata is but he's not the one who brought alistar to the table

To inform you: Mata is the support player for the Chinese team Royal Never Give Up, season 4 World Champion and Worlds MVP (he was the best support in the world back then), and a phenomenal Alistar player. Yesterday/this morning (depends on time zone) he carried the shit out of a match with his Alistar.
Ikr Alistar already received nerfs from the last worlds so i hope i dont see it happening again
